Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Reassign \Re`as*sign"\ (r[=e]`[a^]s*s[imac]n"), v. t. To assign back or again; to transfer back what has been assigned. [1913 Webster]
reassign v : transfer somebody to a different position or location of work [syn: {transfer}]
